alert.note: Alert for Barber (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 10:29PM CDT until July 16 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Barber County in south central Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1029 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Lake City, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Barber County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
